apis.description: com.wadpam.rnr.json.JComment The comment controller implements all REST methods related to commenting.
com.wadpam.rnr.json.JFavorites The favorites controller implements all REST methods related to favorites.

com.wadpam.rnr.json.JFeedback The feedback controller implements all REST methods related to feedback.
 This feature can be used to provide registration form or feedback form.
com.wadpam.rnr.json.JLike The like controller implements all REST methods related to likes.
com.wadpam.rnr.json.JProduct The product controller implements all REST methods related to products.
com.wadpam.rnr.json.JQuestion The question controller implements all REST methods related to question and answers.
com.wadpam.rnr.json.JRating The rating controller implements all REST methods related to ratings and reviews.
com.wadpam.rnr.json.JThumbs A Thumbs and and down controller
